admin_id: Your Discord ID. You can find this by running \@Yourname in Discord
email: The registered email address of your bot
password: The password for your bot's account
server_id: The Discord server ID that you want the bot to join
channel_name: The default channel to have the bot join on connect
google_key: Your API key for Google URL shortener. This is currently required
download_dir: The absolute path to the directory you want to use for the bot cache
redis_url: The connection URL for your Redis server
mongo_url: The connection URL for your MongoDB server
volume: The default volume for the bot
